subject: Add deprecation notices to project-* skills in .claude/skills/
description: Add appropriate deprecation notice after YAML frontmatter in each of the 16 project-* SKILL.md files in .claude/skills/. Core workflow skills get plan mode notice, utility skills get /plan-* replacement notice. Verification: `grep -l "DEPRECATED" .claude/skills/project-*/SKILL.md | wc -l` â†’ `16`
activeForm: Adding deprecation notices to Lisa project skills
